name: Balloon Crush
description:
*Game Details :

=> There are 10 levels. Each level have speed challenges and crush balloons.
=> Each balloons crush 2 point add in score. if you miss balloon score will 1 point minus.
=> If you crush Dangerious balloon 20 points minus.
=> If you crush Sweet balloon you will get 10 points.

*Features :

=> 10 Levels
=> Awesome graphics
=> Diffrent colors balloons
=> Dangerious & Sweet balloons

Have a nice play! Enjoy Balloon Crush!
